1.content: Since you are a dude, so what are you?
1.title: Beginning

13.content: Since you are a witch, what is your name?
13.title: Witch

131.content:
Name : Alex Clearwater
Eye Color : Brown
Hair Color : Black
Height : 5'9
Age : 18
Powers : Telepathy, Telekinesis, Premonition, Photokinesis, Projection
Friends : Chris Halliwell , Henry Mitchell Jr.
Relatives : Uncle : Darryl Morris, Cousin : Darryl Jr. Cousin : Micheal Morris
Lives : Roommate : Jackson Rhodes Roommate : Ethan Bishop
131.title: Alex's Bio

132.content:
So your nick, the African American new student in Chris's class. And that recently just found out that your both a witch and firestarter. And you found you have seven powers. Which are Telepathy, Premonition, Pyrokinesis, Telekinesis, Levitation, Empathy, and finally Projection. Whose also living with the charmed ones of this generation. Chris, Wyatt, and Melinda.

So which story do you choose?
132.title: Nick stories

choices: Coop comes downstairs and kisses you
Chris comes downstairs and kisses you
1321.content:
After having the school lecture of the century, from our principal Ms. Rivers. I might accidentally said " Life would be better if all girls were sent to another planet with no idea what men are!" Suddenly as walked through the door of Halliwell manor I see Victor, Leo, Henry Mitchell, and his son Henry Mitchell Jr. laying on the couch with distend bellies. That's when Henry and Leo began making out. Quickly I then knew what had recently transpired. My projection went a little out of control!
What next?
1321.title: Story 1

13211.content:
Seemingly you noticed that your wish kind of backfired on you. And you realize that the alleged Charmed Ones are now gone literally as in erased from time and space. Along with no on realizes that there was once females on this planet either. And to be honest they are quite happy, if I don't say so myself. Then deciding to see what else is changed, I walked towards the stairs and saw none other than, Coop. And looking down I see a basketball orb shaped gut he is carrying in his button up shirt, which looked on the edge of bursting. The Cupid quickly picked up the pace and dragged or should I say beamed me up to his room and.........

What happens next?
13211.title: Coop comes downstairs and kisses you

133.content:
So, your name is Joshua Bennett. But originally you were from the real world, and made a wish on the shooting star that passed by thinking that your wish to be a witch from comes true. It turns out it did, and seemingly you got the powers of Telekinesis, Premonition, Empathy, Telepathy, Projection, and finally Mimicry.

You kinda have a crush on Cole, and a few others.

So which story should you unfold?
133.title: Josh

choices: Stripped a few demons of there powers
Go out partying at a club
1331.content:
It wasn't long ago that you've started your life in San Francisco. And with that being said, since mostly the things that went on in your life wasn't the best. Since after your parents finding out your a witch, decided to somewhat disown you. Being too brain-washed into the media on seeing witches as evil. But, hey it wasn't your fault, that you were made like this. And as for starters, getting your own house was the top of the list.

Seeing as the was one on the way far end of town that was literally like eight blocks away from your somewhat crazy parents. Moving in was that hard though, and being that I've graduated from magic school it really wasn't that hard getting things situated around here. With that being said, feeling that the house or should I say manor was too quite around here. You began to look for some fun....

What did you do?
1331.title: Story 1

13311.content:
So you then decide why not have some fun with a few demons and warlocks. With a somewhat rather chilling grin, you then began to grab your varying crystal and began to spin it over a map. Very quickly and rather odd, it stopped at an alley on fourth street. Grabbing a few potions and rushed out the door. You said with a smile, "Oh this is going to be fun!" As you drove off, thinking off nothing more than letting loose a bit. Passing by the occasional couples that walked by on the street.

In a manner fifteen minutes, you made it on fourth street. Slowly but surely, getting out of the jeep and making your way over into the alley. You see something that you didn't even expect, it was......
13311.title: Stripped a few demons of there powers

133111.content:
It was three demonic children, all boys, both sitting outside of a broken down ice cream truck. Smiling like they were about to cause even more trouble.As you see the blonde boy said, "Hey Ari, why Don't we just see if there anymore of those awful trucks still around?" Looking up at the young brunette with the red jacket on. From who you guessed was Air, gave out a sigh saying" Alright. But, we have to play this smart. And that means your going to follow my exact orders to the letter, Seth. No straying from the plan, and that means you Jersey. " Giving the boy in the long blue soe even shirt a glare who just thrown back a smile. Moving in closer, but still out of their line one sight you softly began chanting.

Children of wicked states of mind,
Who are cruel beyond time,
Stripped them of their ghastly powers,
So bless it be!

As golden and white orbs began to engulf said children, you could only hear them yell, scream at each other. Demanding to know who what is happening around here. With a smile that turned into a rather chilling smirk, you walk out from where you were hiding from behind the beaten down truck. They quickly caught sight of you and as the tried their best none of them were able to use or even access their former powers. Screaming in anger, they yelled "What did you do to us?" Oh, nothing that you won't soon enjoy. You replied back right after you threw a potion to their feet knocking them out cold.

And just like that, you began chanting once more. To make sure that everything would go according to plan when they wake up from the little nap. And as the those same white and golden orbs filled each of the three formerly demonic children, you quickly lifted up and placed them in the backseat and drove back home.
133111.title: Three Demon Kids

choices: Eric Smith, 33 year old IT guy just moved into town.
John Moore, 18 year old college freshmen.
Billy Giles, a 25 year old drifter
Alex Cross, a 22 year old struggling musician
14.content: OK, you're a male human but who are you?
14.title: Human

choices: Tuatha, a powerful evil witch from the 18th century.
141.content:
You just got settled into your new place after finding a tech job for this club under new management, P3. It may not be the ideal IT job but any job in this economy is a good one. You hear that 3 sister own the place but have not met them yet. You were hired online so you are eager to meet them and get started, but that will have to wait until Monday morning being it is Sunday afternoon.
You walk out from your bedroom and into the living room and there is someone standing there as if they just appeared….

Who is it?
141.title: Eric Smith, 33 year old IT guy just moved into ...

choices: OK boss what do you need?
Don't take this the wrong way but hell no!
Bag is a little small for that.
1411.content:
( http://www.sitcomsonline.com/photopost/d... )

"Uhhh.. How did you get in my apartment?" You ask this beautiful curvy fiery redhead.

She smiles and replies, “That’s not of your concern. What is of concern to me is your new job and the 3 sister that run it.”

“OK, but who are you?”

She smiles wickedly and says, “I’m Tuatha and I am your new boss, you work for me now.”

You shake your head and reply, “Uh no, they pay me so I would have to say they are my bosses.”

Tuatha pulls out a black velvet bag about the size of football (American) and tosses it to you. You catch it and feel the weight of it immediately. Opening it up you see it is full of gold coins, thousands of dollars worth. She then says, “But I pay more”

You look up at her and say….
1411.title: Tuatha, a powerful evil witch from the 18th cen...

choices: So you will find my wand for meright?
14111.content:
You say, "Ok Boss what do you need? I mean I'll call in the morning and tell them I quit..."

You are cut off by her stating, “No you will not quit that is part of what I need from you Eric. See you will go on as if you are working for the club and the sisters but I also will need you to search for something.”

You nod and ask what exactly and Tuatha tells you, “A wand, MY WAND. See the 3 sisters aren’t just sisters they are evil witches and they stole the wand from me with the help of this evil Choosen One thought they killed me but they just sent me far away. Now I am back, a bit weaker but with my wand I will regain my full power. So just find my wand for me Eric and you will be rewarded even more, you’ll get everything you deserve.”
“Witches, evil ones? Come on you don’t expect me to believe that do you? Next you’ll tell me you are a good witch or something.” You say in a almost laughing manor.

Tuatha flashes a angry glare at you for the insulting manor in which you are addressing her but quickly smiles and plays along, “I am one Eric, a good witch and with your help I can defeat them. Tell you what a display of my power.”

( http://stylo21.com/wp-content/uploads/20... )

You smile and wait for so stage magician trick but in one instant your coffee table was empty and the next a Burger King Triple Whooper with cheese. You were hungry and thought about going to get one for dinner and there it is. You’re jaw drops and you look at her. She smiles back and says….
14111.title: OK boss what do you need?

choices: Think you need more sleep and go to bed, got to start the new job Monday.
Get on the computer and start googling sulfur smell.
1412.content:
You walk out of the bedroom and smell something odd, is that sulfur you think. Entering your living room you see this stunningly beautiful woman.

( http://i00.i.aliimg.com/wsphoto/v0/53397... )

You are speechless and she walks up to you and say, “My, my my you are even sexier than I thought. “ She feels your arms and asks, “Hmm you work out?”

Now you are an IT, guy and definitely would not be confused with a gym rat (5’9” 185 pounds). You feel strange and want to ask her what she is doing in your place but the words can’t come to your lips.

She giggles and steps back and says, “I’ll check in with you again soon Eric, after you meet your new bosses.”

You blink and she is gone, poof with a scent of sulfur.
1412.title: A sexy succubus

info.brief_description: Help the males of the charmed series gain weight or should I say pack on the pounds?
info.description:
Rules

1. No death
2. Mpreg is allowed
3. Male Weight gain is allowed
4. Unbirth is allowed
5. Sex is allowed
6. Dick, Oral, Anal Vore is allowed
7. Can create new characters
8. Can give the new / old characters new powers
9. Can either be gay, straight, or bi
10. No short paragraphs
